text: Tomcat 3.2 refuses to recompile new JSP source.  I have to delete all references to the page I wish to update in the $TOMCAT_HOME/work directory and restart Tomcat
creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
marc.saegesser@apropos.com
text:
This seems to work OK in my tests.  One thing that can cause confusion is if 
the 'new' JSP file has a date that's earlier than the 'old' file.  This can 
happen if the files are copied between systems with clocks that are out of 
sync.  If you can still duplicate this problem, double check the timestamps on 
the .jsp and .class files.
